titles.title: A resolution to express the sincere condolences of the Senate to the families of victims of the aircraft crash at the Stapleton International Airport in Denver, Colorado.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/20/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sincere condolences of the Senate to the injured victims of the aircraft crash at the Stapleton International Airport in Denver, Colorado, and to the families and friends of those who died.
